channel.title: [PI] Need Shop Help!
channel.description: i added in a shop that is supposed to use ecto tokens to buy items. and it does...but theres a but...a huge but!(pun intended) the shop wont allow you to buy anything unless u have coins in you inventory as well, but then it takes your coins, and it takes the tokens too but it gives you 2 of the item also when it should only give one :s does anyone have a fix for this? let me know what to post and ill post it as well. thanks in advance

ok so going from the complete default even, it still buys with coins and dung tokens\ecto tokens. and still adds 2 of the item bought. i dont get how this happens :s

i added in a shop that is supposed to use ecto tokens to buy items. and it does…but theres a but…a huge but!(pun intended) the shop wont allow you to buy anything unless u have coins in you inventory as well, but then it takes your coins, and it takes the tokens too but it gives you 2 of the item also when it should only give one :s does anyone have a fix for this? let me know what to post and ill post it as well. thanks in advance
